com.analog.lyric.dimple.environment

Class DimpleThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.analog.lyric.dimple.environment.DimpleThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDimpleEnvironmentHolder, java.lang.Runnable

    public class DimpleThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements IDimpleEnvironmentHolder
    An extension of standard Thread class that inherits its active dimple environment from its parent thread.

    Use this in place of the standard Thread class to ensure that new threads inherit the same DimpleEnvironment.active() value as their creating thread.

    Since:
    0.07
    See Also:
    DimpleThreadFactory

    • Method Detail

      • getEnvironment

        public DimpleEnvironment getEnvironment()
        The active dimple environment for this thread.

        This is set during construction and is either an explicitly specified environment or is the active environment of the thread in which this thread object was created.

        Specified by:
        getEnvironment in interface IDimpleEnvironmentHolder
        Since:
        0.07
        See Also:
        run()

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the body of the thread.

        Sets the thread's active dimple environment to environment specified in constructor and then invokes Thread.run().

        If overridden, the implementation must begin with: 

         super.run();
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
